last_episode_to_air.name: Dead Man's Caravan
last_episode_to_air.overview: Della takes the kids on holiday to Wales. Germaine and Aretha suffer romantic disappointments, and Della encounters an old flame.

name: Raised by Wolves
overview:
Set on a Wolverhampton council estate, Raised By Wolves is modern day reimagining of the childhood of Caitlin Moran and her brothers and sisters.

Single-mum Della lives in a three bedroom council house with Germaine, Aretha, Yoko, Mariah, Wyatt and baby Cher. She is attempting to raise the children by herself, but does have visits from Grampy, who likes to come around to dispense his wisdom to his grandchildren.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Germaine continues to desecrate every societal norm whilst depressed intellectual Aretha becomes even more misanthropic. Grampy begins to enjoy his divorce in a very visceral manner.

episodes.name: Hand Jam
episodes.overview: Della takes all  the kids out foraging for free food. Yoko reaches a female milestone in the bushes, prompting emergency intervention from Della and threatening Germaine's plans to get close to Lee.

episodes.name: Yoko's Got Talent
episodes.overview: Germaine's underwear situation traumatises the only male in the Garry family, seven-year-old Wyatt, prompting an emergency shopping trip up town.

episodes.name: Mehmesis
episodes.overview: Cousin Cathy's arrival causes great romantic rivalry in the Garry household, and Germaine's plan to psychologically crush her cousin soon spirals out of control.

episodes.name: The iPhone, the Bitch and the Wardrobe
episodes.overview: Della forces the kids to attend sad uncle Natie's birthday party where Germaine develops an unusual perspective on Cathy and Lee's relationship.

episodes.name: Little Orphan Mannie
episodes.overview: Della and the kids rally when Grampy suffers a loss and takes comfort in an unexpected place. Germaine finds an odd way to deal with her emotions.

episodes.name: The Dorch
episodes.overview: Hearing that Cathy and Lee have split up, a jubilant Germaine prepares to strike at legendary nightclub 'The Dorch'. Della goes on a very economical date with Michael.

episodes.name: The Monroe Technique
episodes.overview: Germaine continues to desecrate every societal norm whilst depressed intellectual Aretha becomes even more misanthropic. Grampy begins to enjoy his divorce in a very visceral manner.

episodes.name: Hairy Poppins
episodes.overview: The Garrys landlady makes a surprise visit. Della evacuates the kids to their dad's while she goes emergency house-hunting.

episodes.name: Old School
episodes.overview: Aretha stuns Della with a request to go to school, prompting memories from Della and Grampy. Germaine brings her new boyfriend over.

episodes.name: Working Girl
episodes.overview: A pregnancy scare leads Della to recruit Germaine as an intern at work, while Aretha meets a kindred spirit with sensible shoes.

episodes.name: The Car Boot
episodes.overview: Della is forced into the tertiary economy at the local car boot sale by an unexpectedly painful utility bill, while Germaine becomes cousin Cathy's unwilling assistant.

episodes.name: Dead Man's Caravan
episodes.overview: Della takes the kids on holiday to Wales. Germaine and Aretha suffer romantic disappointments, and Della encounters an old flame.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Germaine continues to desecrate every societal norm whilst depressed intellectual Aretha becomes even more misanthropic. Grampy begins to enjoy his divorce in a very visceral manner.
